description.value:
Samsarans are mysterious humanoids who experience an endless cycle of birth to death to rebirth. When a samsaran dies, they reincarnate into a young samsaran to live a new life. The memories of their past lives are hazy and indistinct, but most samsarans seek lives of balance and englightment to ensure their continuing rebirth.

Ability Adjustments +2 Int, +2 Wis, -2 Con
Hit Points 4

Size and Type

Samsaran are Medium humanoids with the samsaran subtype.

@Compendium[sfrpg.racial-features.17KJtkpSw3CqG07C]{Lifebound}

Samsarans gain a +2 racial bonus to saving throws against death effects, saving throws to remove negative levels, and Constitution checks for long-term stability.

@Compendium[sfrpg.racial-features.ivfqMdylivscbLak]{Low-Light Vision}

Samsarans have low-light vision.

@Compendium[sfrpg.racial-features.vHCzpGBfatXJQ8Tj]{Samsaran Magic}

Samsarans gain the following spell-like abilities (see page 262): 1/day—@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zxecXzHipD4MEoFc]{Comprehend Languages}, @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.2vjeLKWVi35DyjNn]{Share Memory}, and @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.v2zuuUuYEgBTMHWY]{Stabilize}. The caster level for these effects is equal to the samsaran's character level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.racial-features.sm8fH4owBO88raVX]{Shards of the Past}

As a legacy of their past lives, samsarans gain a +2 racial bonus to any two skills of their choice.
